title: HPI 44 - It All Depends - Nagarjuna on Emptiness
itunes:title: HPI 44 - It All Depends - Nagarjuna on Emptiness
description: Nāgārjuna founds the Madhyāmaka (“middle way”) Buddhist tradition by “relinquishing all views” and arguing that everything is “empty.”
content:encoded: Nāgārjuna founds the Madhyāmaka (“middle way”) Buddhist tradition by “relinquishing all views” and arguing that everything is “empty.”
itunes:subtitle: Nāgārjuna founds the Madhyāmaka (“middle way”) Buddhist tradition by “relinquishing all views” and arguing that everything is “empty.”
itunes:summary: Nāgārjuna founds the Madhyāmaka (“middle way”) Buddhist tradition by “relinquishing all views” and arguing that everything is “empty.”
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
